summary: This is a cover email from Judge Alison J. Nathan's chambers transmitting a court order in the case US v. Maxwell (20cr330) to defense counsel Jeff Pagliuca and Laura Mennirper. The order was issued on October 31, 2021, and was to be docketed the following morning.

events.title: Court Order Issued in US v. Maxwell
events.description: Judge Alison J. Nathan issued an order in the criminal case US v. Maxwell (20cr330), which was transmitted to defense counsel and scheduled to be docketed the next morning.

keyFacts: The document is a cover email transmitting a court order from Judge Alison J. Nathan's chambers in the case US v. Maxwell (docket number 20cr330).
The order was issued on October 31, 2021, and was to be formally docketed on November 1, 2021.
The recipients were defense attorneys Jeff Pagliuca and Laura Mennirper, indicating they were representing Ghislaine Maxwell at this time.
The email confirms ongoing legal proceedings in the Maxwell case as of late 2021.
